thread.section_title: Veaul 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Veaul 的点评意见 | veaul.com
thread.title: Mandy - South Africa
thread.title_full: Veaul 的点评人 Mandy - South Africa

author: Mandy - South Africa
title: Mandy - South Africa
text: This is a great company to deal with and is officially my new supplier after I placed my first order with them last month and was completely blown away by the excellent quality of the dress I received. It was exactly as shown on the photos and they even send little gifts with each order. Anni is extremely helpful, responding to all questions without any delay. She goes out of her way to meet all my clients requirements and custom changes they ask for. Highly recommended!!!
